title: 115_s1738
content: Medicare Home Infusion Therapy Access Act of 2017 This bill amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to temporarily provide for transitional Medicare payment with respect to certain home infusion services furnished on or after January 1, 2019. Under current law, the Center for Medicare amp. Medicaid Services is required to establish a permanent payment system with respect to such services furnished on or after January 1, 2021.
